body:
So I think the cycle is:

`W` -> `[.grad]` -> `[.grad_fn]` -> `[.next_functions]` -> ... -> `grad_accumulator for W` -> `W`

Previously, we had the grad_accumulator have a weak reference to it's parent. I changed it to a strong reference when we switched Variable to ATen. We need to figure out a way to avoid the reference cycle.
